name: Secrets Exchanged
effect: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.
description: Nefer's specialty. "How about this in exchange for a story?" No sooner are the words out of her mouth than a plate of fragrant, crispy spheres appears in front of you. Before you have time to agree, she gently catches your hand. "Oh, and by the way," she adds, "each mouthful buys at least one sentence." ...Sure enough, one has to pay the right price for a taste of Nefer's cooking...
